greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Exponents a(1), a(2), ... such that E_8, 1 + 480*q + 61920*q^2 + ... (A008410) is equal to (1-q)^a(1) (1-q^2)^a(2) (1-q^3)^a(3) ... .
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..424
formula: a(n) = (1/n) * Sum_{d|n} A008683(n/d) * A289638(d). - _Seiichi Manyama_, Jul 09 2017
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jun 21 2017
